# **Introduction to Open Data Science Course**

## **Open Data - Open Science - Data science**

The learning platform for this course is MOOCs (Massive Open Online Courses) of the University of Helsinki: http://mooc.helsinki.fi. More information about the course can be found in this link: https://courses.helsinki.fi/en/hymy005/120776718


## **Course Schedule**

Time: Tuesdays 31.10 – 12.12.2017 /14:00 -16:00


## **Course outline**

Introduction and discussions

1. Tools and methods for open and reproducible research. 
2. Regression and model validation.
3. Logistic regression. 
4. Clustering and classification.
5. Dimensionality reduction techniques.
6. Final assignment.
